name: Robotosyzm 4 STAR ( FULL BOSS )
description:
Robotosyzm - FULL 4 STAR BOSS. 2023 NEW BOSS

ElectroBot - Boss 1 / 3  

 NEW STAR SYSTEM: all of my cuphead levels now have stars in their title. 1 Star meaning "Semi Hard Level" 1.5 Stars: "Hard Level" 2 Stars: "Insane" 3 Stars: "DEMON" 4 Stars: "EXREME DEMON" 5 Stars:  "ANNIHILATION"

Controls:

Switch weapon: 1        Move: Arrow key

Ex shot: Q                   Shrink: W/R

Parry: Space               Shoot: E
